settings.title: Description
settings.answer:
A garden party at the château. Gilded halls and marble floors, steeped in the echoes of centuries past, yet alive with the promise of an experience unlike any other. Tonight, the château pulses with rebellion, where bold audacity meets 18th-century elegance. This is a moment to be unforgettable. A creation as nuanced and defiant as the night itself. With a deliberate press, the fragrance blooms, unfolding a story in a whisper... A sparkling cascade of lychee, rhubarb, and bergamot – bright, tangy, and irresistible – beckons you to keep the revelry alive. Nutmeg threads through the top notes, a hint of spice daring the unexpected.

At the heart of the fragrance, a floral bouquet takes center stage. Damascena rose, regal yet untamed, intertwines with the delicate innocence of lily of the valley and the lush allure of peony. It is a harmony crafted for a woman who shatters convention and revels in her singularity. The château exhales the fragrance as night melts into dawn, amplifying its enchantment. As time bends and stretches, the base notes emerge, grounding the composition in irresistible sensuality. Vanilla weaves creamy sweetness through the deeper textures of white musk and cashmere, while Cedarwood adds earthy sophistication.

This is not just a fragrance. It is the story of a place where the ordinary becomes extraordinary, where elegance flirts with audacity, and where transformation becomes reality.

settings.title: Shipping & Return
settings.answer: Orders within the UAE will be delivered in approximately 1-2 business days, while international orders may take around 10-14 business days to arrive.

settings.title: Additional Info
settings.answer:
Notes:
T: Lychee, Rhubarb, Bergamot

H: Rose, Incense, Orange Blossom

B: Oud, Vanilla, Amber, Sandalwood

settings.title: Free shipping
settings.content: Free worldwide shipping and returns - customs and duties taxes included

settings.title: Customer service
settings.content: We are available from monday to friday to answer your questions.

settings.title: Contact us
settings.content: Need to contact us? Just send us an e-mail at sales@amaya-international.com.

Elegance with an Edge
A scent for those who shatter convention.

The Lasting Impression

———————————————
More Than a Fragrance. A Transformation.
Where elegance flirts with audacity.

settings.title: Do you ship overseas?
settings.answer: Yes, we ship all over the world. Shipping costs will apply, and will be added at checkout. We run discounts and promotions all year, so stay tuned for exclusive deals.

settings.title: How long will it take to get my order?
settings.answer: It depends on where you are. Orders processed here will take 5-7 business days to arrive. Overseas deliveries can take anywhere from 7-16 days. Delivery details will be provided in your confirmation email.

settings.title: Any question?
settings.answer: You can contact us through our contact page! We will be happy to assist you.

settings.title: Rule-Breaking Perfumes
settings.content: Designed for those who refuse the ordinary.

settings.title: Evolves With You
settings.content: Layers of scent revealing new sides of you.

settings.title: More Than a Scent
settings.content: A bold statement of freedom and self-discovery.
